summary: Want to make FaceGen morphs for Fallout 3 & New Vegas? Or do you want your abnormal race mod to be compatible with any and all helmets without clipping issues? Well we can learn here!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=3][b][u]CREDITS:[/u][/b][/size][/font][list]
[*][b][font=Tahoma][size=3]FancyPants (For information regarding the custom skeletons and for providing the images in the Creation Kit section of the tutorial!)[/size][/font][/b]
[*][b][font=Tahoma][size=3]NifSkope Team (For NifSkope)[/size][/font][/b]
[/list][b]
[size=3]This tutorial shows you how to create a custom skeleton which will get Helmets to fit on any custom Head Mesh whether abnormally Big or abnormally Small. Basically, it's an automatic hat stretcher.

[/size][/b][u][b]My other mods:[/b][/u][list]
[*][size=2](Fallout 4) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/660/?]My Little Pony User Interface Overhaul Project[/url][/size]
[*][size=2](Fallout 4) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/7107/?]Animated Vault Boy HEAD[/url][/size]
[*][size=2](Fallout 4) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/18669/?]Vault Girl STATS[/url][/size]
[*][size=2](Fallout 4) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/11937/?]Classic-Overseer-Monofonto Fonts Replacers[/url][/size]
[*][size=2](Fallout 4) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/15212/?]RaceCustomizer (For custom races)[/url][/size]
[*][size=2](Skyrim Special Edition) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6278?]Immortal/Essential Followers[/url][/size]
[*][size=2]Crimes Against Nature Adaptations ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/22316/?]Fallout 3[/url] / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/62466/?]New Vegas[/url])[/size]
[*][size=2]My Little Pony - Mane 6 Followers ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/22325/?]Fallout 3[/url] / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/62500/?]New Vegas[/url])[/size]
[/list]

[/list][b][u]

author: lazyradly and FancyPants
